reviews.review:
Сложно оценивать эту игру положительно, но... она скорее хорошая, чем плохая. У неё всего 3 недостатка:
1 Графика/требования. Оптимизация тут не к черту. В целом, графен терпимый, но стоит присмотреться... все текстуры - пиксельные, огонь отвратительный, волосы рисовал какой-то наркоман... Но при этом для Ultra/60fps/1080p нужна gtx 1066, не хуже.
2 Баланс... Больная тема этой игры. Тут можно многое написать, но мне лень. Если кратко, то баланс здесь дерьмовый и некоторые карты нужно фиксить. 
3 Баги. Графические баги, баги с анимацией, баги лвлдизайна, баги физики, баги перков и итемов... Как минимум, в каждом втором матче вы найдете какой-нибудь баг. 
+ традиционно дерьмовое сообщество, при чем не только русское. Ещё тут есть поляки, турки... Как в Cs:go, короче.
Плюсы описывать не буду, т. к. их тут всего 1: идея игры.
P.S. 16.09.18. В последние дни багов стало еще больше, теперь за маньяка вообще невозможно поиграть: постоянные вылеты, дисконнекты и прочая фигня.

朋友让我买来陪她玩，买来之后真的超级好玩！只是一个小萌新，很喜欢躲过屠夫之后劫后余生的感觉，以及在修电机的时候我大气都不敢出。哈哈，我在语音都不说话了。生怕听不到按空格的声音。总之现在跳楼价，比我买的时候还便宜。真的很实惠。唯一不好的就是游戏的匹配系统不够完善，我们3、4个人一起玩，晚上都找不到队伍。听说白天好一点，我也不知道为什么。希望可以改善。游戏bug也有一些，希望后续可以做得更好。但是总体来说还是一个好游戏，不知道为什么现在差评变多了。新的DLC很实惠，买求生之路就送。求生之路只要17。恩，总之希望大家不要因为bug放弃这个游戏，真的很好玩。

I do not reccomend this game, while it is a very fun and original game and it has potential to be awesome.
The fact that only the killers can host the game is a very bad mechanic and trying to join a survive with friends game is neraly impossible my friends and I sat "Searching For Games" for 30 minutes. This game was really fun when it first came out and my friends and I played it alot but then when it became popular, and more and more people downloaded it they starte to force updates and DLC that was not finished causing problems. The game is great and all but even streamers dont play it because of the awful matchmaking, auto-aim for killers, and other bull-shit I reccomend if you want this game to wait it out until you hear news about a good patch to fix the game. Thank you for your time and hope you make the right decision on wheteher to buy this or not.
s

This game started out so great.  Probably one of the most unique games I have ever played.  my heart would beat as if a real killer was chasing me.  The thrill of chasing and being chased is quite invigorating.

However, with every update that the dev's bring out, more bugs come out.  I don't know how they can keep bringing out new content without fixing basic issues, like being able to reliably find a game, or to not lag out of 2/3 of the games you play.  With the direction this game is headed, I highly suggest you look elsewhere for a product that actually works.

I really enjoyed this game when I first got it, so I hate to write this review. I enjoyed it enough to buy it for 4 of my friends so we could all play together. The idea is unique and interesting, and the gameplay was a lot of fun. However, as time went on it was all downhill from there. After getting past the part of being a newbie and having absolutely no idea what was going on, and once I began to learn how the game worked and climbed through the ranks, the glaring balance issues became more and more obvious. And as time went on, the bugs became more and more problematic.

First things first, the biggest reason why I'm not playing much anymore. It takes hours to find a game, there's 7,000+ people online right now but it just took me 2 hours to get into a game. A game which usually lasts less then 30 minutes (assuming it doesn't end early due to disconnects). That's absurd. I noticed this new update, and some balancing changes recently and I wanted to come back and try them out. But I don't have that kind of time to spend just waiting in a lobby.

The gameplay itself. In the early levels where nobody has perks (or at least no major ones), the game is a lot of fun. The game stops being fun when you start leveling up and getting perks. And don't get me wrong, the idea of perks is good, the actual perks they added are not. And not all the perks ruin it, just the ones that are overpowered but those ones tend to be present in every single game at higher levels. There are overpowered perks and strategies on both the survivor and killer's sides.

The biggest problem with the perks and strategies is that the developers do not seem to understand the concept of counterplay, which is absolutely essential to make anything balanced and fun. Taking the Decisive strike perk for example, one that is considered an overpowered survivor perk. When the killer catches you you get a skillcheck, it's an easy to hit skill check that if you hit it, automatically stuns the killer and allows you to escape. The killer has no way of knowing if you have this, and there's absolutely nothing they can do to stop you. It's basically just a secret "get out of jail free" card for when you screw up. This kind of gameplay is NOT fun for the survivors or the killer. Then the developer's idea of "fixing" this ability, is making it so you have to wait a few seconds before using it. What difference does that really make? It's still a get out of jail free card that has no counterplay unless you happen to be dumb enough to go down right next to a hook.

On the killer's side, there's hook camping. Once a survivor is caught and placed on a hook the killer can just stand right next to it to prevent other survivors from saving the hooked survivor. There's absolutely nothing the survivors can do if the killer does this, that player's just dead. Which also isn't fun for either side. I, so far, have seen nothing done to prevent or discourage killers from doing this. And as someone who has done game design as a hobby (Not professionally), this would be so easy to fix, there's no excuse for it still being a problem.

And those are just two examples, there's others. When they fix the matchmaking to not take so long, fix the balancing issues, and fix the general lack of counterplay, I'll gladly give this a positive review. Because at it's core, it is a good, unique, and fun game. I really want to reccomend this, but I can't reccomend it in it's current state. And the review section as of recently reflects the same things I'm saying, it's full of people like me who really think this game has what it takes to be an amazing game, but are frustrated with the rediculously long wait times, the lack of balance, and the constant bugs/glitches/disconnects.

I used to love this game, i still try to, but there are a few problems with it.
 
The main one in my opinion is the gigantic amount of hate that is within this games players. It is rare to finish a match without the killer or the survivors (Mainly the killer) to recieve a hate comment (or comments) because the game did not go in the enraged player's favor. such comments are based off categories such as: "machine-gunning", "endless loops",  etc. but the biggest one as we all know is CAMPING. But, in my theory, These people are actualy blaming other people because they can't accept the fact that they lost because of their own actions. And yes, i do understand that these tactics are annoying,  but we should not make the game less enjoyable to others because a game did not go in our liking. And for this reason it is with a heavy heart that i give this game a 4/10 and a "not recommended."

SIDE NOTES:

For the people that do camp. i beg you to please stop. i know what i said, but it's just unfair.

And there are also a few connection and matchmaking issues

This game

4 survivors, 1 killer. As a survivor you're tasked to activate generators to escape the area. You see everything in 3rd-person. As for the killer, your job is down survivors and offfer them to sacrifice. You see in 1st person, which may get a bit harder for those with limited view. If you're interested in getting "Friday the 13th" in the future, this is a simpler version of the game.

It's a great thrilling game to play with your friends or just with randoms. It does get your adrenaline pumping. I'd put this on my list of games that all PC players should play.
I didn't like it so i refunded it, but it's well made and i could see why people like it

It is a well made game with a fun concept but there are diffidently some major flaws with the game. But if you enjoy the gameplay loop then you will likely not grow bored of the game anytime soon.

I have played the game now for over a year, and here's what i think. At first the game is awesome. However the more you play, and the more involved you get the more you see the problems this game has. 

The Devs really make very little attempt at making this game good. Their is soooooo much wrong with this game, and it seems to  only get  worse. I'm sure you can find the laundry list of problems if you look for it.

The community has become VERY TOXIC! If you try to explain your point of view about the game, you will be trolled and blasted. I have never seen a community so toxic. 

Several times i have tried to point out what's wrong with the game, thinking the devs will listen and make some sort of attempt at fixing it. But they don't! Bugs, connection issues, random problems, and soooooo much more.

The balance between killer and survivor is just plain stupid. It isn't fair, and the devs and community don't care. The killers get the short end, while almost every asttempt at making the survivors better is addressed. I'm sure the game will be just as fun for the survivors when all the killers are gone  :)

Making the killer host the game is probably the most retarded thing i have ever seen. What if the killer has a bad connection? Well now it's worse because you are hosting 4 other players. 

The devs spend their time releasing more content for you to purchase, and 0 time trying to repair the game.

In short i just want to say that fater spending the amount of time and money on the game that i did...i wish i could take it all back. This company will never get another dime from me.

If you don't believe me...purchase the game and see for yourself. Be sure to check the community out to...no toxic people there...noooooo

Overall, I would reccomend this game. I think it's an extremely enjoyable (if slightly intense) experience, with or without friends. I've played this game for hours and hours at a time, and I rarely get bored of playing. I love the mechanics and community (except for the campers, of course)
There was a major flaw to this game, and that was the time it would take to get into a server. However, with the latest patch, that seems to be fixed, making this game hundereds of times more enjoyable then it used to be.

Game is full of bugs, and each update gets buggy, how is that even possible? How do you add new things in and stuff not related to the thing be broke, let alone the fact the TEAM does not give any fs about their fan base at all, they are good at using their dedicated players as cows, just to milk them out of their money for poorly made cosmetics, that anyone could make in a few days top.

I've been giving them the benefit of a doubt that it's hard, I get that. But this game hasn't changed THAT much for the years it's been out, I've been through nearly all their updates. (Started a week after it was launched), the only things they have changed, is balancing issues which were obvious from the start, like what the hell were you guys thinking back in 2016, to have insta gen addon for toolboxes? And Self-Care being so god damn strong let alone stack with other perks back then.

And lets talk about the community, by far the most brain-dead gaming community I have ever met, no one seems to have brains when it comes to solo queue, like for new players, that's okay. You're learning. What I mean is people with lengthy hours 50+, not knowing how to play Survivor properly, like you're playing the most easiest role in the game, and you have difficulties repairing generators let alone LOOP a killer for more than 5 seconds.

If survivors had brains, the game would be ultimately favouring the survivor, but because survivors are so damn stupid, the DBD TEAM, will always buff them to make it fair for brain-dead survivors to have a chance of escaping.


Do I recommend this game? Honestly it's a mix, if you're on your own definitely not, unless you can handle losing 24/7 because of your team instead of yourself.

But with friends? Go for it.

Das wichtigste vorab: Kauft euch dieses Spiel NICHT. Warum?
Ganz einfach:

1. Bugs: Dieses Spiel ist mit Bugs überladen. Statt die volle Energie darauf zu verwenden diese zu fixen, werden immer neue kostenpflichtige DLCs veröffentlicht. M.M.n. ein absolutes No-Go.

2. Matchmaking Suche: Man tritt mit Freunden einer Lobby bei und startet die Suche. In 8/10 Fällen findet man dann zunächst ewig kein Spiel und wenn doch, bricht der Killer ab und man wird aus der Lobby geworfen. Statt dass man nun wieder mit seinen Freunden in eine Lobby kommt, landen alle wieder im Hauptmenü. Nervig ist da noch eine harmlose Beschreibung für diesen Vorgang.

3. Ranking-System: Man kann durch gewinnen von Spielen im Rang aufsteigen. Allerdings nur, wenn man genug Punkte gesammelt hat. Ein einfaches Gewinnen reicht nicht aus. Immerhin: Man kann nicht absteigen, wenn man gewinnt. Aber damit nicht genug. Der Rang fließt scheinbar in keiner Weise in die Suche ein. Level 20 (der niedrigste Rang) Überlebende werden mit Rang 1 Killern gematcht und andersherum. Für mich erübrigt sich das Ranking-System dadurch völlig.

4. P2P: Das Spiel basiert auf Peer to Peer und der Killer ist immer der Host. Sprich wenn der Killer eine schlechte Internetverbindung hat ist das Spielerlebnis gelinde gesagt grauenhaft. Klar kosten Server eine Menge Geld, aber wäre es nicht machbar gewesen, immer den Spieler mit der besten Verbindung als Host einzusetzen?

Wenn man alles zusammen nimmt, ist das Spielerlebnis bestenfalls mittelmäßig und es ist schnell frustrierend. Man bekommt das Gefühl der Entwickler ist mehr auf Geld, als ein spielbares Spiel aus, was ebenfalls einen bitteren Nachgeschmack hinterlässt.

Ich hoffe man versteh meine Beweggründe und ich konnte vielleicht bei der Entscheidung helfen, ob einem dieses Spiel 20 Euro (nur das Grundspiel) wert ist.

Kann seit mehr als einem Monat das Spiel nicht mehr Starten. Launcher Error. Wenn ich es als Administrator ausführen möchte kommt nur api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll existiert nicht auf dem PC. Da meine Pc kenntnisse ziemlich bescheiden sind hab ich keine Ahnung was ich tun soll und möchte mir auch ungern irgendwas unvertrauenswürdiges ausm Internet herunterladen. Habe auch schon hier nach lösungen gesucht aber nichts gefunden was ich richtig verstanden hab.

Wäre echt schön wenn mir jemand per PN weiterhelfen könnte da ich wirklich großer Fan vom Spiel bin und entäuscht darüber das ich schon ein Bloddpoint Event verpasst habe... :(

If you want to play solo this game is fun. I had a lot of fun with this game until i couldn't play with friends. With the awful matchmaking it is impossible to play with friends (you will never find a match). If you enjoy playing with friends DO NOT BUY this game.
